entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43266

Closed

  • No CLI projects in solution explore #10672
  • Cleanup unnecessary branches #43106
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43147

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the stale limit by a year #43267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • manually port the loc build update #43265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix all StrBegin comments to be StrBegins to correctly show up in the… #43264
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a Locked comment for NETSDK1147 to prevent overlocalization #43263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #43262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Change Windows PR build image #43259
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change Windows PR build image #43258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Cloak sRGB.icm from VMR #43249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove check now that NuGet/Home#7801 is fixed #43107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra set of testexecutiondirectory #43190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the non-windows package verification message. #43251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Dev Device ID #43148
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Telemetry, 9.0.1xx
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fixes for the unified project experience within Blazor projects/apps #33649
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Summary of how we do localization in this repo #43202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Add basic guidelines for telemetry usage for tooling authors #43097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Update dotnet test protocol messages #43226
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
